ranked_signals.title: New START Nuclear Treaty Expires
ranked_signals.rationale: Expiration of last nuclear arms control treaty between world's two largest nuclear powers. Immediate risk of unconstrained arsenals with no successor framework.
primary_impacts: Unconstrained nuclear arsenal expansion by US and Russia
Collapse of post-WWII arms control architecture

ranked_signals.title: EPA Eliminates Clean Air Act Endangerment Finding
ranked_signals.rationale: Legal foundation for all US federal climate regulation eliminated. Paradigm-shifting deregulatory action with cascading global implications for Paris Agreement commitments.
primary_impacts: Legal basis for all federal GHG regulation removed
EPA authority to regulate CO2 as pollutant eliminated

ranked_signals.title: Geoeconomic Confrontation Named World's Top Risk 2026
ranked_signals.rationale: WEF identifies tariffs, sanctions, industrial policy as strategic weapons -- paradigm shift from military to economic confrontation as #1 global risk trigger.
primary_impacts: Paradigm shift: economic tools as primary instruments of geopolitical confrontation
Supply chain weaponization becoming normalized

ranked_signals.title: ILO: Global Jobs Gap Reaches 408 Million in 2026
ranked_signals.rationale: ILO flagship report reveals 408M global jobs gap beyond headline unemployment. 2.1B workers in informal economy, 260M NEET youth -- structural social vulnerability at scale.
primary_impacts: 408M global jobs gap exposes failure of standard unemployment metric
2.1B workers in informal economy without protection -- systemic vulnerability

ranked_signals.title: China Clean Energy Drives 1/3 of GDP Growth
ranked_signals.rationale: Clean energy driving 1/3 of GDP growth in world's second-largest economy. Solar/wind surpassing coal signals irreversible energy transition.
primary_impacts: Clean energy as economic growth engine -- not just environmental policy
Solar/wind surpassing coal: structural irreversibility signal

ranked_signals.title: Gold Breaches $5,000
ranked_signals.rationale: Historic gold price milestone reflects profound loss of confidence in fiat currencies and structural repricing of monetary policy expectations.
primary_impacts: Historic gold price signals structural loss of confidence in fiat currencies
Fed pivot expectations driving massive monetary policy repricing

ranked_signals.title: Microsoft Majorana 1 Topological Quantum Chip
ranked_signals.rationale: First topological quantum chip may solve decoherence -- the fundamental barrier to practical quantum computing. Paradigm shift in quantum architecture.
primary_impacts: Potential solution to decoherence -- the core barrier to practical quantum computing
New architectural paradigm for fault-tolerant qubits

ranked_signals.title: AI-Assisted Engineers Learn 25% Less
ranked_signals.rationale: Anthropic study: AI-assisted engineers score 50% vs 67% for unassisted -- empirical evidence that AI tools degrade human learning capacity.
primary_impacts: Empirical evidence: AI assistance degrades human learning (50% vs 67% mastery)
Fundamental challenge to AI-augmented workforce paradigm

ranked_signals.title: Jimmy Lai Sentenced to 20 Years
ranked_signals.rationale: Landmark press freedom case signals definitive end of 'one country, two systems.' Foreign nationals charged under NSL -- extraterritorial reach precedent.
primary_impacts: Definitive end of 'one country, two systems' in practice
Landmark press freedom case with global chilling effect

ranked_signals.title: Baby KJ: First Personalized CRISPR Gene-Editing Treatment
ranked_signals.rationale: First-ever personalized CRISPR gene editing on a human. Opens era of bespoke genetic medicine with profound ethical, social, and medical implications.
primary_impacts: Opens era of bespoke genetic medicine -- treatment designed for individual patient
Proof of concept for personalized gene therapy at clinical scale

ranked_signals.title: FDA Clears First Human Trial of Epigenetic Reprogramming
ranked_signals.rationale: First human clinical trial of anti-aging therapy using Yamanaka factors (OSK). Historic translation from lab to patient of partial cellular rejuvenation.
primary_impacts: First-ever human clinical trial of anti-aging gene therapy using Yamanaka factors
Potential to reverse age-related cellular damage (not just slow aging)

ranked_signals.title: Global CBDC Race Accelerates
ranked_signals.rationale: Multiple major economies simultaneously advancing CBDCs. Structural transformation of global monetary infrastructure and cross-border payments.
primary_impacts: Multiple major economies simultaneously launching digital currencies
Monetary infrastructure modernization at global scale

ranked_signals.title: Climate Models Missing Key Ocean Player
ranked_signals.rationale: Climate models systematically underrepresent plankton shallow dissolution -- potentially skewing carbon cycle projections and climate policy targets.
primary_impacts: Systematic bias in climate projections if plankton dissolution omitted
Carbon cycle budget calculations potentially incorrect

ranked_signals.title: US Jobs: Structural Labor Market Transformation
ranked_signals.rationale: Demographic contraction (US adding only 23M in 30yr vs 70M prior), aging workforce, immigration decline compounding structural labor supply crisis.
primary_impacts: Demographic contraction: US to add only 23M in 30yr vs 70M previous 30yr
Older workers extending careers while younger generation disengaging

ranked_signals.title: ~800 New Deep-Sea Species Found Before Mining
ranked_signals.rationale: 800 new species in mining-targeted Clarion-Clipperton Zone. 37% animal decline documented -- critical mineral demand vs conservation tension intensifying.
primary_impacts: Biodiversity discovery in mining-targeted areas creates urgent conservation tension
37% animal decline and 32% species reduction in mined areas documented

ranked_signals.title: Cerebras Raises $1B for AI Chip Alternative
ranked_signals.rationale: $1B funding at $23B valuation signals investor conviction in Nvidia GPU monopoly disruption via wafer-scale AI chip architecture.
primary_impacts: Wafer-scale AI chip as fundamental alternative to GPU architecture
$23B valuation signals investor conviction in Nvidia disruption

ranked_signals.title: Mechanistic Interpretability: 2026 Breakthrough
ranked_signals.rationale: First systematic approach to understanding AI model internal reasoning. MIT Technology Review 2026 Breakthrough -- critical for AI safety and alignment.
primary_impacts: First systematic approach to understanding AI model internal reasoning
Shift from black-box to transparent AI possible

ranked_signals.title: Global Energy Storage to Exceed 100GW in 2026
ranked_signals.rationale: Global energy storage exceeding 100GW milestone enables higher renewable penetration. EV sales overtaking petrol in EU -- transportation electrification accelerating.
primary_impacts: Energy storage milestone enables higher renewable penetration
EV sales overtaking petrol in EU (Dec 2025) -- transportation electrification

ranked_signals.title: Sodium-Ion Batteries Emerging as Lithium Alternative
ranked_signals.rationale: Salt-based batteries could break lithium supply chain dependency and democratize energy storage for developing countries.
primary_impacts: Salt-based batteries could break lithium supply chain dependency
Cheaper energy storage democratizing grid and EV access

ranked_signals.title: H-2B Visa Expanded: +64,716 for FY2026
ranked_signals.rationale: +64,716 H-2B visas confirms persistent seasonal labor shortage. Immigration policy tension between expansion needs and restriction rhetoric.
primary_impacts: Persistent labor shortage in seasonal industries confirmed by policy response
Immigration policy tension: expansion vs restriction rhetoric

ranked_signals.title: AI Trustworthiness: Operational Necessity
ranked_signals.rationale: Shift from aspirational AI principles to mandatory operational requirements. Autonomy threshold legislation and legally defined human oversight levels emerging.
primary_impacts: Shift from aspirational principles to mandatory operational requirements
Autonomy threshold legislation being considered

ranked_signals.title: EU Targets Meta Over AI Assistants (DMA)
ranked_signals.rationale: DMA enforcement expanding to AI-level platform gatekeeping. Meta required to enable rival AI assistants on WhatsApp -- new competition law frontier.
primary_impacts: DMA enforcement expanding to AI-level platform gatekeeping
Platform-embedded AI assistants as new competition law frontier

ranked_signals.title: US Judge Rules Secret Climate Panel Unlawful
ranked_signals.rationale: Judicial check on executive climate policy manipulation. DOE Secretary Wright's handpicked panel ruled illegal -- scientific advisory process integrity defended.
primary_impacts: Judicial check on executive climate policy manipulation
Scientific advisory process integrity defended

ranked_signals.title: Portugal: Center-Left Defeats Far-Right
ranked_signals.rationale: Counter-trend to European far-right surge. Center-left viability demonstrated in Portugal -- democratic resilience signal in populist era.
primary_impacts: Counter-trend to European far-right surge
Center-left viability demonstrated in populist era

ranked_signals.title: NASA Perseverance AI-Driven Autonomous Navigation
ranked_signals.rationale: AI-generated waypoints for Mars rover -- 450m autonomous drive reduces Earth-Mars communication dependency. Template for future autonomous planetary exploration.
primary_impacts: AI-generated waypoints reduce Earth-Mars communication dependency
450m autonomous drive demonstrates practical AI-rover integration

ranked_signals.title: WHO: 40% of Cancer Cases Preventable
ranked_signals.rationale: WHO identifies 40% of cancer cases preventable across 30 causes including 9 infections. Paradigm reframing from treatment to prevention.
primary_impacts: 40% prevention rate identified across 30 causes including 9 infections
Public health priority reframing from treatment to prevention

ranked_signals.title: Stanford Optical Cavities Enable Scalable Quantum Networking
ranked_signals.rationale: Miniature optical cavities enable simultaneous multi-qubit reading. Scalable quantum networking with hundreds of cavities complements topological approach.
primary_impacts: Miniature optical cavities enable simultaneous multi-qubit reading
Scalable quantum networking with hundreds of cavities demonstrated

ranked_signals.title: US Patent Applications Drop 9%
ranked_signals.rationale: US patent applications decline 9% while cell-related technology surges 23%. Samsung leads with 7,054 grants -- innovation geography shifting.
primary_impacts: Innovation output declining after record highs
Samsung leading with 7,054 grants (+11% YoY) -- East Asian dominance

ranked_signals.title: Artemis II Delayed to March
ranked_signals.rationale: Hydrogen leak delays first crewed lunar mission since Apollo 17. SLS reliability concerns increasing amid SpaceX Starship competitive pressure.
primary_impacts: Hydrogen leak delays first crewed lunar mission since Apollo 17
SLS reliability concerns for Artemis program timeline

ranked_signals.title: Deep-Sea Chiton Named by Public Vote
ranked_signals.rationale: 8,000 public naming submissions for deep-sea chiton signals growing citizen science engagement and science-society relationship evolution.
primary_impacts: Citizen science engagement growing -- 8,000 naming submissions
Science communication democratization via social media (YouTube)
